document.full_text: for a race that has been around for 100 years and bills itself as "the greatest spectacle in racing", the indianapolis 500 will speed into a new era on sunday focused on the future as fans embrace the past.
document.title: indycar looks to future as fans embrace past
lines_and_colors: for a race that has been around for 100 years and bills itself as "the greatest spectacle in racing", the indianapolis 500 will speed into a new era on sunday focused on the future as fans embrace the past.
